trans-unit.source: 3 ways to solve NoClassDefFoundError
trans-unit.target: 3种解决NoClassDefFoundError的方法

trans-unit.source: NoClassDefError will be thrown accompanied with ExceptionInInitializerError from the static block RuntimeException.
trans-unit.target: NoClassDefError 将与 ExceptionInInitializerError 一起从静态块 RuntimeException 中抛出。

trans-unit.source: NoClassDefFoundError can also occur when a static initializer tries to load a resource bundle that is not available in runtime, for example a properties file that the affected class tries to load from the META-INF directory, but isn’t there. If you don’t catch NoClassDefFoundError, sometimes you won’t be able to see the full stack trace; to overcome this you can temporarily use a catch clause for Throwable:
trans-unit.target: NoClassDefFoundError 当静态初始化程序尝试加载运行时不可用的资源包时，例如，受影响的类尝试从 META-INF 目录加载但不在此处的属性文件，也会发生NoClassDefFoundError。如果您没有捕获 NoClassDefFoundError ，有时您将看不到完整的堆栈跟踪信息。为了克服这个问题，您可以为 Throwable 临时使用 catch 子句：

trans-unit.source: throw a RuntimeException in the static block of your class Example
trans-unit.target: throw 一个 RuntimeException 的在 static 类的块 Example

trans-unit.source: NoClassDefFoundErrorDemo.java
trans-unit.target: NoClassDefFoundErrorDemo.java

trans-unit.source: SimpleCalculator.java
trans-unit.target: SimpleCalculator.java

trans-unit.source: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException This exception indicates that the class was not found on the classpath. This indicates that we were trying to load the class definition, and the class did not exist on the classpath.
trans-unit.target: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException 此异常表明在类路径上找不到该类。这表明我们正在尝试加载类定义，并且该类在类路径中不存在。

trans-unit.source: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError This exception indicates that the JVM looked in its internal class definition data structure for the definition of a class and did not find it. This is different than saying that it could not be loaded from the classpath. Usually this indicates that we previously attempted to load a class from the classpath, but it failed for some reason - now we're trying to use the class again (and thus need to load it, since it failed last time), but we're not even going to try to load it, because we failed loading it earlier (and reasonably suspect that we would fail again). The earlier failure could be a ClassNotFoundException or an ExceptionInInitializerError (indicating a failure in the static initialization block) or any number of other problems. The point is, a NoClassDefFoundError is not necessarily a classpath problem.
trans-unit.target: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError 此异常表明JVM在其内部类定义数据结构中查找了类的定义，但未找到。这与说无法从类路径中加载不同。通常，这表明我们以前曾尝试从类路径中加载类，但是由于某种原因而失败-现在我们正尝试再次使用该类（因此，由于上次失败，因此需要加载该类），但是我们甚至不打算尝试加载它，因为我们之前加载失败（并且合理地怀疑我们会再次失败）。较早的故障可能是ClassNotFoundException或ExceptionInInitializerError（指示静态初始化块中的故障）或许多其他问题。关键是，NoClassDefFoundError不一定是类路径问题。

trans-unit.source: NoClassDefFoundError In Java
trans-unit.target: Java中的NoClassDefFoundError

trans-unit.source: Definition:
trans-unit.target: Definition:

trans-unit.target: Examples:

trans-unit.source: Possible Solutions:
trans-unit.target: 可能的解决方案：

trans-unit.source: @xli's answer gave me insight into what may be wrong in my code.
trans-unit.target: @xli的回答让我明白了我的代码中可能存在的问题。

trans-unit.source: A simple example of NoClassDefFoundError is class belongs to a missing JAR file or JAR was not added into classpath or sometimes jar's name has been changed by someone like in my case one of my colleagues has changed tibco.jar into tibco_v3.jar and the program is failing with java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError and I were wondering what's wrong.
trans-unit.target: NoClassDefFoundError的一个简单例子是类属于一个缺失的JAR文件,或者JAR没有被添加到classpath中,或者有时jar的名字被人更改了,比如我的一个同事把tibco.jar改成了tibco_v3.jar,程序出现java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError,我就想知道是什么原因导致程序失败。

trans-unit.source: And the problem gone away.
trans-unit.target: 问题也就消失了。

trans-unit.source: Any start-up script is overriding Classpath environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 任何启动脚本都会重写Classpath环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Because NoClassDefFoundError is a subclass of java.lang.LinkageError it can also come if one of it dependency like native library may not available.
trans-unit.target: 因为NoClassDefFoundError是java.lang.LinkageError的一个子类,如果它的一个依赖关系(如本机库)可能无法使用,它也会出现。

trans-unit.source: Check for java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError in your log file. NoClassDefFoundError due to the failure of static initialization is quite common.
trans-unit.target: 检查日志文件中是否有java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError。由于静态初始化失败导致的NoClassDefFoundError非常常见。

trans-unit.source: Closing the trunk copy of the project and running the test case again got rid of the problem.
trans-unit.target: 关闭项目的主干副本,再次运行测试用例,就排除了这个问题。

trans-unit.source: Everyone talks here about some Java configuration stuff, JVM problems etc., in my case the error was not related to these topics at all and had a very trivial and easy to solve reason: I had a wrong annotation at my endpoint in my Controller (Spring Boot application).
trans-unit.target: 大家都在这里谈论一些Java配置的东西,JVM的问题等等,在我的情况下,这个错误完全与这些话题无关,而且有一个非常琐碎且容易解决的原因:我在我的Controller(Spring Boot应用程序)中的端点有一个错误的注释。

trans-unit.source: For example,
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: HelloWorld (main class)
trans-unit.target: HelloWorld (主类)

trans-unit.source: Here is the code to illustrate java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError. Please see Jared's answer for detailed explanation.
trans-unit.target: 这是说明 java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError 的代码。请参阅Jared的答案以获取详细说明。

trans-unit.source: I am getting a NoClassDefFoundError when I run my Java application. What is typically the cause of this?
trans-unit.target: 运行Java应用程序时出现 NoClassDefFoundError 。通常是什么原因造成的？

trans-unit.source: I fixed my problem by disabling the preDexLibraries for all modules:
trans-unit.target: 我通过禁用所有模块的preDexLibraries来修复我的问题。

trans-unit.source: I found the solution. In my case, there was the static method defined due to that. The JVM can not create the another object of that class.
trans-unit.target: 我找到了解决的方法。在我的案例中,有一个静态方法定义了,由于。JVM无法创建该类的另一个对象。

trans-unit.source: I get NoClassFoundError when classes loaded by the runtime class loader cannot access classes already loaded by the java rootloader. Because the different class loaders are in different security domains (according to java) the jvm won't allow classes already loaded by the rootloader to be resolved in the runtime loader address space.
trans-unit.target: 当运行时类加载器加载的类不能访问java rootloader已经加载的类时,我得到NoClassFoundError。因为不同的类加载器处于不同的安全域(根据java的说法),jvm不允许在运行时加载器地址空间中解析已经被根加载器加载的类。

trans-unit.source: I got NoClassDefFound errors when I didn't export a class on the "Order and Export" tab in the Java Build Path of my project. Make sure to put a checkmark in the "Order and Export" tab of any dependencies you add to the project's build path. See Eclipse warning: XXXXXXXXXXX.jar will not be exported or published. Runtime ClassNotFoundExceptions may result.
trans-unit.target: 当我没有在项目的Java Build Path的“ Order and Export”选项卡上导出类时，出现NoClassDefFound错误。确保在添加到项目的构建路径的所有依赖项的“订购和出口”选项卡中打上对勾。请参阅Eclipse警告：XXXXXXXXXXX.jar将不会导出或发布。运行时ClassNotFoundExceptions可能会导致。

trans-unit.source: I got this error when I add Maven dependency of another module to my project, the issue was finally solved by add -Xss2m to my program's JVM option(It's one megabyte by default since JDK5.0). It's believed the program does not have enough stack to load class.
trans-unit.target: 当我在项目中添加另一个模块的Maven依赖项时出现此错误，最终通过在程序的JVM选项中添加 -Xss2m 解决了该问题（自JDK5.0起默认为1兆字节）。可以认为程序没有足够的堆栈来加载类。

trans-unit.source: I got this message after removing two files from the SRC library, and when I brought them back I kept seeing this error message.
trans-unit.target: 我从SRC库中删除两个文件后得到了这个消息,当我把它们带回来时,我一直看到这个错误消息。

trans-unit.source: I had the same problem, and I was stock for many hours.
trans-unit.target: 我也遇到了同样的问题,而且是库存了好几个小时。

trans-unit.source: I have found that sometimes I get a NoClassDefFound error when code is compiled with an incompatible version of the class found at runtime. The specific instance I recall is with the apache axis library. There were actually 2 versions on my runtime classpath and it was picking up the out of date and incompatible version and not the correct one, causing a NoClassDefFound error. This was in a command line app where I was using a command similar to this.
trans-unit.target: 我发现,当代码在运行时发现类的版本不兼容时,有时我会得到一个NoClassDefFound错误。我记得具体的例子是apache axis库。实际上,在我的运行时classpath上有2个版本,而它接收的是过期的和不兼容的版本,而不是正确的版本,导致NoClassDefFound错误。这是在一个命令行应用程序中,我使用了类似于这样的命令。

trans-unit.source: I was able to get it to pick up the proper version by using:
trans-unit.target: 我通过使用,让它拿起了合适的版本。

trans-unit.source: I was using Spring Framework with Maven and solved this error in my project.
trans-unit.target: 我在Maven中使用Spring Framework，并在项目中解决了此错误。

trans-unit.source: If a class was present during compile time but not available in java classpath during runtime.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个类在编译时存在,但在运行时在java classpath中不可用。

trans-unit.source: If someone comes here because of java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/log4j/Logger error, in my case it was produced because I used log4j 2 (but I didn't add all the files that come with it), and some dependency library used log4j 1. The solution was to add the Log4j 1.x bridge: the jar log4j-1.2-api-<version>.jar which comes with log4j 2. More info in the log4j 2 migration.
trans-unit.target: 如果有人因为 java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/log4j/Logger 错误而来到这里，则由于我使用log4j 2而产生了该错误（但我没有添加它随附的所有文件），还有一些依赖库使用log4j 1.解决方案是添加Log4j 1.x桥：log4j 2附带的jar log4j-1.2-api-<version>.jar 。更多有关log4j 2 迁移的信息。

trans-unit.source: If you are working in J2EE environment than the visibility of Class among multiple Classloader can also cause java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError, see examples and scenario section for detailed discussion.
trans-unit.target: 如果你是在J2EE环境中工作,那么多个Classloader之间的Class的可见性也会导致java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError,详细的讨论见示例和场景部分。

trans-unit.source: In a way you're "sharing" the static block execution between tests, but the initial ExceptionInInitializerError will be just in one test case. The first one that uses the problematic Example class. Other test cases that use the Example class will just throw NoClassDefFoundErrors.
trans-unit.target: 在某种程度上，您正在“共享” 测试之间的 static 块执行，但是初始 ExceptionInInitializerError 只是在一个测试用例中。第一个使用有问题的 Example 类。使用 Example 类的其他测试用例只会抛出 NoClassDefFoundErrors 。

trans-unit.source: In case you have generated-code (EMF, etc.) there can be too many static initialisers which consume all stack space.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有生成的代码(EMF等),可能会有太多的静态初始化器,这些静态初始化器会消耗所有的堆栈空间。

trans-unit.source: In my case I was able to resolve this error, while building a high-profile open-source project, by switching from Java 9 to Java 8 using SDKMAN!.
trans-unit.target: 就我而言，通过使用SDKMAN从Java 9切换到Java 8，在构建一个备受瞩目的开源项目时，我能够解决此错误！。

trans-unit.source: In my case I was getting this error due to a mismatch in the JDK versions. When I tried to run the application from Intelij it wasn't working but then running it from the command line worked. This is because Intelij was attempting to run it with the Java 11 JDK that was setup but on the command line it was running with the Java 8 JDK. After switching that setting under File > Project Structure > Project Settings > Project SDK, it worked for me.
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">就我而言，由于JDK版本不匹配，导致出现此错误。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">当我尝试从Intelij运行该应用程序时，它无法运行，但随后从命令行运行了。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">这是因为Intelij试图使用已设置的Java 11 JDK运行它，但在命令行上却使用Java 8 JDK运行它。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">在“文件”>“项目结构”>“项目设置”>“ Project SDK”下切换该设置后，它对我有用。</font></font>

trans-unit.source: In my case, the problem was Eclipse's inability to differentiate between two different copies of the same project. I have one locked on trunk (SVN version control) and the other one working in one branch at a time. I tried out one change in the working copy as a JUnit test case, which included extracting a private inner class to be a public class on its own and while it was working, I open the other copy of the project to look around at some other part of the code that needed changes. At some point, the NoClassDefFoundError popped up complaining that the private inner class was not there; double-clicking in the stack trace brought me to the source file in the wrong project copy.
trans-unit.target: 就我而言，问题是Eclipse无法区分同一项目的两个不同副本。我有一个锁定在主干（SVN版本控制）上，而另一个则一次在一个分支中工作。我将工作副本中的一个更改作为JUnit测试用例进行了尝试，其中包括将一个私有内部类本身提取为一个公共类，并且在工作时，我打开了该项目的另一个副本以查看其他内容。需要更改的部分代码。在某个时候， NoClassDefFoundError 弹出来，抱怨私有内部类不存在。双击堆栈跟踪将我带到错误的项目副本中的源文件。

trans-unit.source: Intercept it (or if it just doesn't matter like it is thrown in a test case)
trans-unit.target: 拦截它（或者如果它像在测试用例中抛出一样没关系）

trans-unit.source: It could also be because you copy the code file from an IDE with a certain package name and you want to try to run it using terminal. You will have to remove the package name from the code first. This happens to me.
trans-unit.target: 也有可能是因为你从IDE中复制了一个带有特定包名的代码文件,你想尝试用终端运行它。你必须先把包名从代码中删除。我就遇到过这种情况。

trans-unit.source: It is important to keep two or three different exceptions straight in our head in this case:
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下,在我们的脑海中,一定要把两个或三个不同的特例都记在脑子里。

trans-unit.source: It produces output showing the loaded class, and the loader env that loaded the class. It's very helpful tracing why a class cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 它产生的输出显示加载的类,以及加载该类的加载器环境。这对追踪类不能被解决的原因很有帮助。

trans-unit.source: Java Virtual Machine is not able to find a particular class at runtime which was available at compile time.
trans-unit.target: Java虚拟机无法在运行时找到一个在编译时可用的特定类。

trans-unit.source: Java was unable to find the class A in runtime. Class A was in maven project ArtClient from a different workspace. So I imported ArtClient to my Eclipse project. Two of my projects was using ArtClient as dependency. I changed library reference to project reference for these ones (Build Path -> Configure Build Path).
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">Java无法在运行时中找到类A。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">A类在其他工作区的Maven项目ArtClient中。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">因此，我将ArtClient导入了我的Eclipse项目。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">我的两个项目使用ArtClient作为依赖项。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">我将库参考更改为这些项目的项目参考（构建路径->配置构建路径）。</font></font>

trans-unit.source: Just try to run with explicitly -classpath option with the classpath you think will work and if it's working then it's a sure short sign that someone is overriding java classpath.
trans-unit.target: 只要尝试用显式-classpath选项来运行你认为可行的classpath就可以了,如果它有效,那就说明有人重写了java的classpath。

trans-unit.source: Make sure this matches in the module:app and module:lib:
trans-unit.target: 确保这在 module:app 和 module:lib 中匹配：

trans-unit.source: My solution was: Restart Eclipse. Since then I haven't seen this message again :-)
trans-unit.target: 我的解决方案是:重新启动Eclipse。从那以后,我就再也没有看到这个消息了 :-)

trans-unit.source: Now that everything has been built and installed, you can go ahead and run the tests.
trans-unit.target: 现在已经构建并安装了所有内容，您可以继续运行测试。

trans-unit.source: One interesting case in which you might see a lot of NoClassDefFoundErrors is when you:
trans-unit.target: 在以下情况下，您可能会看到很多 NoClassDefFoundErrors 的有趣情况是：

trans-unit.source: Permission issue on JAR file can also cause NoClassDefFoundError in Java.
trans-unit.target: JAR文件上的权限问题也会导致Java中的NoClassDefFoundError。

trans-unit.source: Resources:
trans-unit.target: Resources:

trans-unit.source: Run your program with 'java -javaagent:tracer.jar [YOUR java ARGS]'
trans-unit.target: 用'java -javaagent:tracer.jar [YOUR java ARGS]' 运行你的程序。

trans-unit.source: See Stack Overflow question How to increase the Java stack size?.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅堆栈溢出问题。如何增加Java堆栈大小？。

trans-unit.source: Spring did not give me a full stack trace of on which line the runtime failed. It simply said NoClassDefFoundError. But when I executed it as a native Java application (taking it out of MVC), it gave ExceptionInInitializerError which was the true cause and which is how I traced the error.
trans-unit.target: Spring没有给我完整的堆栈跟踪信息，表明运行时在哪一行失败。它只是说了 NoClassDefFoundError 。但是，当我将其作为本机Java应用程序执行（从MVC中取出）时，它给出了 ExceptionInInitializerError ，这是真正的原因，也是我跟踪错误的方式。

trans-unit.source: SupportClass
trans-unit.target: SupportClass

trans-unit.source: Suppose we have a package called org.mypackage containing the classes:
trans-unit.target: 假设我们有一个名为 org.mypackage 的包，其中包含以下类：

trans-unit.source: The class is not available in Java Classpath.
trans-unit.target: 该类在Java Classpath中是不可用的。

trans-unit.source: The class is not in Classpath, there is no sure shot way of knowing it but many times you can just have a look to print System.getproperty("java.classpath") and it will print the classpath from there you can at least get an idea of your actual runtime classpath.
trans-unit.target: 该类不在Classpath中,没有肯定的方法知道它,但很多时候你可以直接看一下print System.getproperty("java.classpath"),它就会打印出classpath,从那里你至少可以知道你的实际运行时classpath。

trans-unit.source: The file structure will look like this:
trans-unit.target: 文件结构会是这样的。

trans-unit.source: The technique below helped me many times:
trans-unit.target: 下面的技巧帮助了我很多次。

trans-unit.source: Then doing a clean install as described below.
trans-unit.target: 然后按下面介绍的方法进行清洁安装。

trans-unit.source: There was a runtime error in the class. I was reading a property as integer, but when it read the value from the property file, its value was double.
trans-unit.target: 类中出现了一个运行时错误。我在读取一个属性为整数,但当它从属性文件中读取值时,其值是双倍。

trans-unit.source: This error can be caused by unchecked Java version requirements.
trans-unit.target: 未检查的Java版本要求可能导致此错误。

trans-unit.source: This is caused when there is a class file that your code depends on and it is present at compile time but not found at runtime. Look for differences in your build time and runtime classpaths.
trans-unit.target: 当你的代码依赖一个类文件,而它在编译时存在,但在运行时却没有找到时,就会出现这种情况。寻找你的构建时间和运行时的类路径的差异。

trans-unit.source: This is especially important case when you see NoClassDefFoundErrors in your UNIT TESTS.
trans-unit.target: 当您在UNIT TESTS中看到 NoClassDefFoundErrors 时，这尤其重要。

trans-unit.source: This is the best solution I found so far.
trans-unit.target: 这是我到目前为止找到的最好的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: Try to create an instance of this class Example
trans-unit.target: 尝试创建此类的 Example

trans-unit.source: Two different checkout copies of the same project
trans-unit.target: 同一项目的两个不同的结账副本

trans-unit.source: Typo on XML Configuration can also cause NoClassDefFoundError in Java.
trans-unit.target: 在XML配置上的打字错误也会导致Java中的NoClassDefFoundError。

trans-unit.source: UtilClass
trans-unit.target: UtilClass

trans-unit.source: When using Maven as your build tool, it is sometimes helpful -- and usually gratifying, to do a clean 'install' build with testing disabled.
trans-unit.target: 当使用的Maven作为构建工具，它有时是有益的-通常喜人，做一个干净的 “安装”构建与测试禁用。

trans-unit.source: When we invoke Java, we specify the name of the application to run: org.mypackage.HelloWorld. However we must also tell Java where to look for the files and directories defining our package. So to launch the program, we have to use the following command:
trans-unit.target: 调用Java时，我们指定要运行的应用程序的名称： org.mypackage.HelloWorld 。但是，我们还必须告诉Java在哪里寻找定义我们程序包的文件和目录。因此，要启动该程序，我们必须使用以下命令：

trans-unit.source: While it's possible that this is due to a classpath mismatch between compile-time and run-time, it's not necessarily true.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这可能是由于编译时和运行时的classpath不匹配造成的,但也不一定是真的。

trans-unit.source: Why am I getting a NoClassDefFoundError in Java
trans-unit.target: 为什么我在Java中得到一个NoClassDefFoundError?

trans-unit.source: You might be running your program using jar command and class was not defined in manifest file's ClassPath attribute.
trans-unit.target: 你可能在使用jar命令运行程序时,在manifest文件的ClassPath属性中没有定义类。

trans-unit.source: and the files defining this package are stored physically under the directory D:\myprogram (on Windows) or /home/user/myprogram (on Linux).
trans-unit.target: 并且定义此软件包的文件实际存储在目录 D:\myprogram （在Windows上）或 /home/user/myprogram （在Linux上）下。

trans-unit.source: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError Problem patterns
trans-unit.target: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError问题模式

trans-unit.source: when your compiled class which is defined in a package, doesn’t present in the same package while loading like in the case of JApplet it will throw NoClassDefFoundError in Java.
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">当在包中定义的已编译类在加载时不在同一包中时（如JApplet），它将在Java中引发NoClassDefFoundError。</font></font>

trans-unit.source: where the TheNoDefFoundClass is the class that might be "lost" due to a preference for an older version of the same library used by your program. This most frequently happens with the cases, when the client software is being deployed into a dominant container, armed with its own classloaders and tons of ancient versions of most popular libs.
trans-unit.target: 其中TheNoDefFoundClass是可能由于你的程序使用的相同库的旧版本而 "丢失 "的类。这种情况最常发生,当客户端软件被部署到一个占优势的容器中时,它有自己的类加载器和大量的老版本的最流行的库。
